title: My promos
body: I went 8-2 in my promos but ended up with bronze 3.  How is that possible?  I also got 6 S- or higher in my promos.  My friends got 2 wins and got silver, how did I get this low of a rank???

replies.body: It will take your previous season into consideration, but with a soft reset most players are going to find themselves in a lower tier/division as things get shuffled down.
Sorry im still a bit confused:  Last season I ended with bronze 2, with the amount I won shouldent I have been placed higher than bronze 2?

Wow unlucky. But if you got placed in bronze 3 with 8 win 2 lost you should have been playing mostly with people at that level mmr. It might depend on what mmr you played too. Like if you’re playing on bronze 1 mmr but went 5-5 it’s harder than getting 8-2 on a bronze 4-5 mmr. However if you don’t belong there you’ll climb out easily.
